sys_documentation.label: Is the relevant FCA regulatory disclosure statement included?

sys_documentation.hint:
"E.g. “Authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority” written in full. This cannot be abbreviated to “FCA”.
Please refer to the Financial Promotions Guidelines for the standard regulatory disclosure statement(s).
Only answer N/A if image advertising.
